snippet: Europe said it would pare back its law in exchange for support on a global deal on airline emissions that would be in place by the end of the decade.
abstract: European Union, seeking to end years of acrimony, is making concessions to the United States in hopes of gaining support for global rules on airline emissions.
lead_paragraph: Europe said it would pare back its law in exchange for support on a global deal on airline emissions that would be in place by the end of the decade.

headline.main: Europe Offers U.S. a Deal, Hoping for Global Rules on Airline Emissions
headline.print_headline: Europe Offers U.S. a Deal, Hoping for Global Rules on Airline Emissions
